select sc.id,bp2.name as parentName, bp.name,bp.score,bp.level from spot_check sc inner join spot_check_list scl on sc.spot_check_list_id = scl.id inner join quality_temp qt on scl.temp_id = qt.id inner join temp_project tp on tp.temp_id = qt.id inner join base_project bp on tp.project_id = bp.id inner join base_project bp2 on bp.parent_id = bp2.id where sc.del_flag = 0 and scl.del_flag = 0 and qt.del_flag = 0 and bp.del_flag = 0 and bp2.del_flag = 0 and sc.id = #{ida}
